message.content:
I need to identify the specific line item and value that represents costs incurred to secure customer orders and to deliver goods and services to customers.

Looking at the income statement, the line items that could represent such costs would typically be in the expense section. While "Cost of Goods Sold" represents the direct costs of producing goods, the item that specifically relates to securing customer orders and delivering goods/services would be "Selling Expenses".

Selling expenses typically include costs related to marketing, sales commissions, advertising, delivery costs, and other expenses directly related to securing customer orders and delivering products.

In the income statement provided, I can see:
```
Selling Expenses | 555218.93 | 2024-01-28
```

This is the line item that represents the costs incurred to secure customer orders and deliver goods and services.

{"solution": {'value': '555218.93'}}
